email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 06/23/2000 11:45 AM --------------------------- Enron North America Corp. From: Michael Walters 06/21/2000 04:17 PM To: Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT, Paul T Lucci/DEN/ECT@Enron cc: Tara Sweitzer/HOU/ECT@ECT Subject: FT-Denver book on EOL Phil or Paul: Please forward this note to Torrey Moorer or Tara Sweitzer in the EOL department. It must be sent by you. Per this request, we are asking that all financial deals on EOL be bridged over to the FT-Denver book instead of the physical ENA IM-Denver book. Thanks in advance. Mick Walters 3-4783 EB3299d
